flawed_nl_solution:
He dropped 2 cantaloupes and had 8 left over at the end of the day, so he sold 30 - 2 - 8 = <<30-2-8=20>>20 cantaloupes.
Three honeydews were rotten, and he had 9 left at the end of the day, so he sold 27 - 3 - 9 = <<27-3-9=12>>12 honeydews.
He sold 20 cantaloupes * $2/cantaloupe = $<<20*2=40>>40 in cantaloupes
He also sold 12 honeydews * $3/honeydew = $<<12*3=36>>36 in honeydews.
Altogether he made $40 + $36 = $<<40+36=76>>76
#### 76

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 12. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
